EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Paris Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Paris at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Monday, May 29, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Google 8 Rue de Londres, Floor B2, 75009 Paris, France (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/8+Rue+de+Londres,+75009+Paris,+France/@48.8771043,2.3279174,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x47e66e49fca8fe0b:0xae2ff28d756df6d5!8m2!3d48.8771043!4d2.3301061?hl=en]]>) Room: Garnier Tech Talk
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions 3:45pm - 4:00pm Panel Q&A
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/paris?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
